title: LOL dying in Australia
body:
It's midday here in Australia and I have a queue time over over 18minutes for an ARAM game. Not to mention before this I had a 22minute wait for a draft Norms. Only a single dodged queue by someone. Is League of legends officially dying?! The queue timer is the same on weekends. I'll have a 15-20 minute wait just for a single game.
https://imgur.com/lZkSTCa

replies.body:
You're playing ARAM and Draft at low level at a time where everyone is at school / work.

90% of the league playerbase will be offline.
Because youâ€™re low level and no one plays aram and no one plays draft. And no one plays at midday. Play blind and night and it will be 0.00 second queue

It is weekdays. 
 - Kids have school.
 - People go to work.

Glad to know the unemployment rate for the LOL population is low.

> [{quoted}](name=TheDemonEmperor,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=EJdYxs6s,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-05-15T02:40:53.084+0000)
> It is weekdays. 
>  - Kids have school.
>  - People go to work.
> 
> Glad to know the unemployment rate for the LOL population is low.

So apparently because I have a day off means that I have a low IQ and am unemployed. Im merely curious why the timer is so long. Obviously you can see I am new to LoL via my account level. So there is no need for the overly sarcastic and rude comment of How high is my IQ. It is also fairly offensive how you assume that I am unemployed (pointing that I am lazy)

I've never said that. You are over analysing the points. What i stated is a logical view of the situation. 

But honestly, cant you use your head to think a few reasons why people are not ingame on the weekdays? This isnt a global server, we have a timezone, and you are on a period where activity is low due to reasons above.

Than my apologies mate.
But I too can edit my comment.
i didnt edit it to protect your feeling. I did it so the communist mod dont ban me.
Your original post is already quoted in my second comment.
